snippet: Representative Trey Radel, who pleaded guilty to cocaine possession and checked into a rehabilitation clinic in November, will rejoin Congress when the new session begins next week.
abstract: Florida Rep Trey Radel, who pleaded guilty to cocaine possession and checked into a rehabilitation clinic in November 2013, will rejoin Congress when the new session begins.
lead_paragraph: Representative Trey Radel, who pleaded guilty to cocaine possession and checked into a rehabilitation clinic in November, will rejoin Congress when the new session begins next week.
